description: Dragonflyis a cyber espionage group that has been attributed to Russia's Federal Security Service (FSB) Center 16.[1][2]Active since at least 2010,Dragonflyhas targeted defense and aviation companies, government entities, companies related to industrial control systems, and critical infrastructure sectors worldwide through supply chain, spearphishing, and drive-by compromise attacks.[3][4][5][6][7][8][9]
